summary: This document appears to be an email or internal communication forwarding or referencing a New York Times (NYT) report. It describes an alleged incident where Jeffrey Epstein is reported to have acted inappropriately towards a woman during a movie outing, while presenting himself as kind and casual.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Described in a forwarded NYT report as being kind and casual, wearing sweatpants and pouring champagne, but then allegedly rubbing a woman's hand and lower leg during a movie.

events.title: Alleged inappropriate incident during movie
events.description: During a trip to see a movie, Jeffrey Epstein allegedly began rubbing a woman's hand and then her lower leg as the film progressed.

keyFacts: The document references a New York Times (NYT) report containing an allegation against Jeffrey Epstein.
The alleged victim described Epstein as appearing 'kind and casual' while wearing sweatpants and pouring champagne, discussing her college plans.
The core allegation is that during a movie, Epstein began rubbing the woman's hand and then her lower leg.
The document is dated November 13, 2019, indicating ongoing media or internal discussion of allegations years after Epstein's initial arrest.
